songs.title: One Time
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Shakewell]
MTM, hit 'em with the heat

[Chorus: Pouya]
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die

[Verse 1: Pouya]
Top shelf pussy got me disappointed in myself
Bitch, you got me singing, got me swimmin' like I'm Michael Phelps
Stuck inside in a hole and I don't know if I can help myself
Swervin' in my 718 while I'm duckin' 12
Stick in da middle of the whip baby don't slip
Can't catch me slackin', no
Dick in the middle of a fat bitch, no lips
Can't catch up to me, no
I'm riding slidin' through your hood
20K around my neck
I ran into a check, you really thought I wasn't about to flex?

[Chorus: Pouya]
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die

[Verse 2: Pouya]
I just did a kamikaze in a Maserati
'Cause I hate myself and I hate everybody
You love me then you hate me, wanna fuck me then you rape me Out my money like I never been nobody
Hit 'em up with that shotgun
Making sure that that clock run outta time, outta my mind
Better run for life and your safety
Back inside that Cadillac, I'm never going back to being broke
One time for all the hoes that thought I was a joke

[Chorus: Pouya]
Ayy, one time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
Ayy, one time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
Ayy, one time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die

[Verse 3: Pouya]
Bye, bye, baby, you ain't never coming back
Drop the top and pop the Glock right out the window of the 'lac
I'm feelin' myself tonight, I'm alive, so many emotions
I'ma dive into the ocean, then rise like I was Moses
Split your wig in bits, chicken and biscuits with your bitch
Oh, boy gon' have a fit
FUCKTHEPOPULATION, you can label me degenerate
My generation dying, I'ma have to save these kids
They doing lean, they popping pills, they off the sedatives

[Chorus: Pouya]
One time for my bitches, two times for my guys
Three times for my .45, gotta keep it by my side
Six deep when we ride, seven in the morning
Gotta get up and get right 'cause tonight's the night we die
